Nightlight:

Nightlight started moved slowly, reacting with Aerotaur's 
voice. "Aerotaur?" said softly Nightlight, effects of cr was 
dissapearing "Where... where are we?"


--- In nbwrpg@y..., Rudra656@a... wrote:
> ::Aerotaur::
>     His legs begin to throb from the holes still in them, but he 
ignores the 
> pain.  He continues hacking at the door until the hole is big 
enough for him 
> to get through.  He runs through to Nightlight.  "Nightlight?  Are 
you okay?  
> Can you here me?"
